HeroSection.subtitle1: Don't forget to use the exclusive coupon code TECHRADAR

planTitles.homePage: Choose the right plan for you

tableSection.lifetimeDescription: All Internxt plans come with complete access to our privacy-focused features. Subscribe to Internxt and secure a year of encrypted cloud storage.
tableSection.planDescription: All Internxt plans are fully featured with complete access to our award-winning privacy suite consisting of Internxt Drive, Send, VPN, Antivirus, Meet and Mail.
tableSection.businessDescription: We’re currently working on new Internxt plans designed exclusively to defend your business, protect your employees, and secure your bottom line.
tableSection.businessDescription2: Ensure business data security with Internxt's encrypted cloud storage plans.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

ScrollableSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
ScrollableSection.subtitle: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

elements.title: Unmatched privacy
elements.description: Protecting your privacy is our top priority; we never store passwords or personal data. Your files are encrypted in transit and at rest, giving you complete control over your information.

elements.title: Uncompromising security
elements.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge and post-quantum encryption, you are the only one with access to your data.

elements.title: Open-source and transparent
elements.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

elements.title: Independently verified
elements.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

CtaSection.title: "Individual users and businesses that prioritize security will enjoy advanced security features and commitment to privacy"

CtaSection2.title: Get the world’s most secure cloud storage
CtaSection2.description: Internxt’s zero-knowledge encryption gives you total control of your privacy.
